top.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested over leak of video allegedly showing Palestinian detainee abuse
top.summary: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking a video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.

top.title: Agony for families as landslide death toll climbs in Uganda and Kenya
top.summary: More than 40 people are known to have died since last week, according to officials.

top.title: French climber among at least three killed in Nepal avalanche
top.summary: A search is continuing in the Dolakha district for four other foreigners who are feared dead.

top.title: Government disappointed by unexpected O2 price rise
top.summary: The technology secretary says O2's higher-than-expected price increase is "disappointing" given the cost of living.

top.title: ChatGPT owner OpenAI signs $38bn cloud computing deal with Amazon
top.summary: The seven-year agreement will see OpenAI gain access to Nvidia graphics processors to train its artificial intelligence models.

top.title: 'No idea who he is,' says Trump after pardoning crypto tycoon
top.summary: The president pardoned Changpeng Zhao, the co-founder of the world's largest crypto exchange, in October.
